catalog_info.title: The Joseph Story and the Book of Esther: Seminar
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1802.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Three years of Hebrew or the equivalent, and a good acquaintance with the historical-critical method.
catalog_info.description: A close critical reading of Genesis 37-50 and the Book of Esther in Hebrew. Emphasis on literary design and religious messages and on the influence of the story of Joseph upon the Book of Esther.
